atk-s0508a24:2_0: Aṭṭhakanipāte kammaṁ bahukantiādikā āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a24:2_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0508a24:2_2: nibbattitvā vuddhippatto, ekadivasaṁ satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthārā saṁkhittena
atk-s0508a24:2_3: bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajantānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ
atk-s0508a24:2_4: disvā, sayampi taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthento paṇidhānaṁ katvā, dānādīni puññāni katvā, devamanussesu
atk-s0508a24:2_5: saṁsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a24:2_6: himavantapabbate ekasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṁ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a24:3_0: So tena puññakammena aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle
atk-s0508a24:3_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ kulaghare nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a24:3_2: satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṁ katvā, ‘‘bhagavā mayhaṁ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a24:4_0: Tato yāvajīvaṁ kusalakammaṁ katvā ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a24:4_1: buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṁ rañño caṇḍapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0508a24:4_2: mātā ‘‘mayhaṁ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, attano nāmaṁ gahetvā āgato’’ti kañcanamāṇavo tveva
atk-s0508a24:4_3: nāmaṁ akāsi. So vuḍḍhimanvāya tayo vede uggahetvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṁ labhi.
atk-s0508a24:4_4: So gottavasena kaccāyanoti paññāyittha. Taṁ rājā caṇḍapajjoto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā,
atk-s0508a24:4_5: ‘‘ācariya, tvaṁ tattha gantvā satthāraṁ idhānehī’’ti pesesi. So attaṭṭhamo satthu
atk-s0508a24:4_6: santikaṁ upagato. Tassa satthā dhammaṁ deseti. Desanāpariyosāne so sattahi janehi
atk-s0508a24:4_7: saddhiṁ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.54.1-27) –
atk-s0508a24:20: Parisaṁ mañca toseti, yathā kaccāyano ayaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:26: Tadā mamāsayaṁ ñatvā, byākāsi sa raṇañjaho.
atk-s0508a24:31: ‘‘Kaccānassa guṇaṁ sutvā, taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthayaṁ ṭhito;
atk-s0508a24:34: Kaccāno nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a24:36: Pāpuṇissati taṁ ṭhānaṁ, yathāyaṁ byākato mayā.
atk-s0508a24:40: Aññaṁ gatiṁ na gacchāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:42: Nīce kule na jāyāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:43: ‘‘Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto ujjeniyaṁ pure;
atk-s0508a24:46: Mātā ca candimā nāma, kaccānohaṁ varattaco.
atk-s0508a24:50: Pāpuṇiṁ amataṁ santaṁ, sesehi saha sattahi.
atk-s0508a24:54_0: Atha satthā ‘‘etha, bhikkhavo’’ti hatthaṁ pasāresi. Te tāvadeva dvaṅgulamattakesamassukā
atk-s0508a24:54_1: iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṁ. Evaṁ thero sadatthaṁ nipphādetvā,
atk-s0508a24:54_2: ‘‘bhante, rājā pajjoto tumhākaṁ pāde vandituṁ dhammañca sotuṁ icchatī’’ti satthu
atk-s0508a24:54_3: ārocesi. Satthā, ‘‘tvaṁyeva, bhikkhu, tattha gaccha, tayi gatepi rājā pasīdissatī’’ti
atk-s0508a24:54_4: āha. Thero satthu āṇāya attaṭṭhamo tattha gantvā rājānaṁ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṁ
atk-s0508a24:54_5: patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva gato. So ekadivasaṁ sambahule bhikkhū samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a24:54_6: pahāya kammārāme saṅgaṇikārāme rasataṇhānugate ca pamādavihārino disvā tesaṁ ovādavasena –
atk-s0508a24:56: ‘‘Kammaṁ bahukaṁ na kāraye, parivajjeyya janaṁ na uyyame;
atk-s0508a24:57: So ussukko rasānugiddho, atthaṁ riñcati yo sukhādhivāho.
atk-s0508a24:59: ‘‘Paṅkoti hi naṁ avedayuṁ, yāyaṁ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a24:60: Sukhumaṁ sallaṁ durubbahaṁ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho’’ti. –
atk-s0508a24:62_0: Tattha kammaṁ bahukaṁ na kārayeti navāvāsakārāpanādiṁ samaṇadhammakaraṇassa paribandhabhūtaṁ
atk-s0508a24:62_1: mahantaṁ navakammaṁ na paṭṭhapeyya, khuddakaṁ appasamārambhaṁ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇādiṁ
atk-s0508a24:62_2: satthu vacanapaṭipūjanatthaṁ kātabbameva. Parivajjeyya jananti gaṇasaṅgaṇikavasena
atk-s0508a24:62_3: janaṁ vivajjeyya. Jananti vā yādisaṁ saṁsevato bhajato payirupāsato kusalā dhammā
atk-s0508a24:62_4: parihāyanti, akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tādisaṁ akalyāṇamittabhūtaṁ janaṁ parivajjeyya.
atk-s0508a24:62_5: Na uyyameti, paccayuppādanatthaṁ kulasaṅgaṇhanavasena na vāyameyya, yasmā so ussukko
atk-s0508a24:62_6: rasānugiddho, atthaṁ riñcati yo sukhādhivāhoti yo rasānugiddho rasataṇhāvasiko bhikkhu
atk-s0508a24:62_7: paccayuppādanapasuto, so kulasaṅgaṇhanatthaṁ ussukko, tesu sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu
atk-s0508a24:62_8: dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā yogaṁ āpajjati, yo sukhādhivāho samathavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānasukhāvaho
atk-s0508a24:62_9: sīlādiattho, taṁ riñcati pajahati ekaṁsena attānaṁ tato vivecetīti attho.
atk-s0508a24:63_1: ovaditvā idāni sakkārābhilāsaṁ garahanto dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Tassattho – yā ayaṁ bhikkhāya
atk-s0508a24:63_2: upagatānaṁ pabbajitānaṁ kulesu gehavāsīhi guṇasambhāvanāya karīyamānā vandanā pūjanā
atk-s0508a24:63_3: ca, yasmā taṁ abhāvitattānaṁ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malinabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ca paṅko kaddamoti
atk-s0508a24:63_4: buddhādayo ariyā pavedayuṁ abbhaññaṁsu pavedesuṁ vā, yasmā ca apariññātakkhandhānaṁ
atk-s0508a24:63_5: andhaputhujjanānaṁ sakkārābhilāsaṁ duviññeyyasabhāvatāya pīḷājananato anto tudanato
atk-s0508a24:63_6: duruddharaṇato ca sukhumaṁ sallaṁ durubbahaṁ pavedayuṁ, tato eva sakkāro kāpurisena
atk-s0508a24:63_7: dujjaho duppajaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato. Sakkārābhilāsappahānena
atk-s0508a24:63_8: hi sakkāro pahīno hoti, tasmā tassa pahānāya āyogo karaṇīyoti dasseti –
atk-s0508a24:66: Attanā taṁ na seveyya, kammabandhū hi mātiyā.
atk-s0508a24:68: ‘‘Na pare vacanā coro, na pare vacanā muni;
atk-s0508a24:69: Attā ca naṁ yathā vedi, devāpi naṁ tathā vidū.
atk-s0508a24:72: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
atk-s0508a24:75: Paññāya ca alābhena, vittavāpi na jīvati.
atk-s0508a24:78: Na ca diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ dhīro, sabbaṁ ujjhitumarahati.
atk-s0508a24:83_0: Imā cha gāthā rañño pajjotassa ovādavasena abhāsi. So kira brāhmaṇe saddahitvā pasughātayaññaṁ
atk-s0508a24:83_1: kāreti, kammaṁ asodhetvāva acore corasaññāya daṇḍesi, aṭṭakaraṇe ca assāmike sāmike
atk-s0508a24:83_2: karoti, sāmike ca assāmike. Tato naṁ thero vivecetuṁ ‘‘na parassā’’tiādinā cha gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a24:84_0: Tattha na parassupanidhāya, kammaṁ maccassa pāpakanti parassa maccassa sattassa upanidhāya
atk-s0508a24:84_1: uddissa kāraṇaṁ katvā pāpakaṁ vadhabandhādikammaṁ na seveyya, parena na kārāpeyyāti
atk-s0508a24:84_2: attho. Attanā taṁ na seveyyāti attanāpi taṁ pāpakaṁ na kareyya. Kasmā? Kammabandhū
atk-s0508a24:84_3: hi mātiyā ime mātiyā maccā kammadāyādā, tasmā attanā ca kiñci pāpakammaṁ na kareyya,
atk-s0508a24:85_0: Na pare vacanā coroti attanā coriyaṁ akatvā paravacanā parassa vacanamattena coro
atk-s0508a24:85_1: nāma na hoti, tathā na pare vacanā muni parassa vacanamattena muni suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro
atk-s0508a24:85_2: na hoti. Ettha hi pareti vibhattialopaṁ katvā niddeso. Keci pana ‘‘paresanti vattabbe
atk-s0508a24:85_3: pareti saṁ-kāralopaṁ katvā niddiṭṭha’’nti vadanti. Attā ca naṁ yathā vedīti naṁ sattaṁ
atk-s0508a24:85_4: tassa attā cittaṁ yathā ‘‘ahaṁ parisuddho, aparisuddho vā’’ti yāthāvato avedi jānāti.
atk-s0508a24:85_5: Devāpi naṁ tathā vidūti visuddhidevā, upapattidevā ca tathā vidū vidanti jānanti,
atk-s0508a24:85_6: tasmā sayaṁ tādisā devā ca pamāṇaṁ suddhāsuddhānaṁ suddhāsuddhabhāvajānane, na ye
atk-s0508a24:86_0: Pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe, kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjaṁ kammaṁ kammaphalaṁ
atk-s0508a24:86_1: kāyassa asubhataṁ saṅkhārānaṁ aniccataṁ ajānantā idha pare nāma. Te mayamettha imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a24:86_2: jīvaloke yamāma uparamāma, ‘‘satataṁ samitaṁ maccu santikaṁ gacchāmā’’ti na jānanti.
atk-s0508a24:86_3: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye ca tattha paṇḍitā ‘‘mayaṁ maccu samīpaṁ gacchāmā’’ti
atk-s0508a24:86_4: vijānanti. Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā medhagānaṁ paravihiṁsanānaṁ
atk-s0508a24:86_5: vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti, attanā pare ca aññe na medhanti na bādhentīti attho. Tvaṁ
atk-s0508a24:86_6: pana jīvitanimittaṁ acore core karontopi daṇḍanena sāmike assāmike karontopi dhanajāniyā
atk-s0508a24:86_7: bādhasi paññāvekallato. Tathā akarontopi jīvate vāpi sappañño, api vittaparikkhayo
atk-s0508a24:86_8: parikkhīṇadhanopi sappaññajātiko itarītarasantosena santuṭṭho anavajjāya jīvikāya
atk-s0508a24:86_9: jīvatiyeva. Tassa hi jīvitaṁ nāma. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘paññājīviṁ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha’’nti
atk-s0508a24:86_10: (saṁ. ni. 1.73, 246; su. ni. 184). Dummedhapuggalo pana paññāya ca alābhena diṭṭhadhammikaṁ
atk-s0508a24:86_11: samparāyikañca atthaṁ virādhento vittavāpi na jīvati garahādipavattiyā jīvanto nāma
atk-s0508a24:86_12: na hoti, anupāyaññutāya yathādhigataṁ dhanaṁ nāsento jīvitampi sandhāretuṁ na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0508a24:87_0: Imā kira catassopi gāthā thero supinantena rañño kathesi. Rājā supinaṁ disvā theraṁ
atk-s0508a24:87_1: namassantoyeva pabujjhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā attanā
atk-s0508a24:87_2: diṭṭhaniyāmena supinaṁ kathesi. Taṁ sutvā thero tā gāthā paccunubhāsitvā ‘‘sabbaṁ
atk-s0508a24:87_3: suṇātī’’tiādinā dvīhi gāthāhi rājānaṁ ovadi. Tattha sabbaṁ suṇāti sotenāti idha sotabbaṁ
atk-s0508a24:87_4: saddaṁ āpāthagataṁ sabbaṁ subhāsitaṁ dubbhāsitañca abadhiro sotena suṇāti. Tathā
atk-s0508a24:87_5: sabbaṁ rūpaṁ sundaraṁ asundarampi cakkhunā anandho passati, ayamindriyānaṁ sabhāvo.
atk-s0508a24:87_6: Tattha pana na ca diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ dhīro, sabbaṁ ujjhitunti ca nidassanamattametaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:87_7: Yañhi taṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ vā, na taṁ sabbaṁ dhīro sappañño ujjhituṁ pariccajituṁ gahetuṁ
atk-s0508a24:87_8: vā arahati. Guṇāguṇaṁ pana tattha upaparikkhitvā ujjhitabbameva ujjhituṁ gahetabbañca
atk-s0508a24:87_9: gahetuṁ arahati, tasmā cakkhumāssa yathā andho cakkhumāpi samāno ujjhitabbe diṭṭhe
atk-s0508a24:87_10: andho yathā assa apassanto viya bhaveyya, tathā ujjhitabbe sute sotavāpi badhiro
atk-s0508a24:87_11: yathā assa asuṇanto viya bhaveyya. Paññavāssa yathā mūgoti vicāraṇapaññāya paññavā
atk-s0508a24:87_12: vacanakusalopi avattabbe mūgo viya bhaveyya. Balavā thāmasampannopi akattabbe dubbaloriva,
atk-s0508a24:87_13: rakāro padasandhikaro, asamattho viya bhaveyya. Atha atthe samuppanne, sayetha matasāyikanti
atk-s0508a24:87_14: attanā kātabbakicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṁ sayetha, matasāyikaṁ sayitvāpi
atk-s0508a24:87_15: taṁ kiccaṁ tīretabbameva, na virādhetabbaṁ. Atha vā atha atthe samuppanneti attanā
atk-s0508a24:87_16: akaraṇīye atthe kicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṁ sayetha, matasāyikaṁ sayitvāpi
atk-s0508a24:87_17: taṁ na kātabbameva. Na hi paṇḍito ayuttaṁ kātumarahatīti evaṁ therena ovadito rājā
atk-s0508a24:90_0: Akkodhanotiādikā āyasmato sirimittattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a24:90_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a24:90_2: rājagahe mahaddhanakuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti, sirimittoti laddhanāmo. Tassa
atk-s0508a24:90_3: kira mātā siriguttassa bhaginī. Tassa vatthu dhammapadavaṇṇanāyaṁ (dha. pa. aṭṭha.
atk-s0508a24:90_4: 1.garahadinnavatthu) āgatameva. So siriguttassa bhāgineyyo sirimitto vayappatto satthu
atk-s0508a24:90_5: dhanapāladamane laddhappasādo pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a24:90_6: patto. Ekadivasaṁ pātimokkhaṁ uddisituṁ āsanaṁ abhiruhitvā cittabījaniṁ gahetvā nisinno
atk-s0508a24:90_7: bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ kathesi. Kathento ca uḷāratare guṇe vibhajitvā dassento –
atk-s0508a24:93: Sa ve tādisako bhikkhu, evaṁ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a24:96: Guttadvāro sadā bhikkhu, evaṁ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a24:99: Kalyāṇasīlo so bhikkhu, evaṁ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a24:102: Kalyāṇamitto so bhikkhu, evaṁ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a24:105: Kalyāṇapañño so bhikkhu, evaṁ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a24:111: Adaliddoti taṁ āhu, amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:114: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṁ buddhāna sāsana’’nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a24:115_0: Tattha akkodhanoti akujjhanasīlo. Upaṭṭhite hi kodhuppattinimitte adhivāsanakhantiyaṁ
atk-s0508a24:115_1: ṭhatvā kopassa anuppādako. Anupanāhīti na upanāhako, parehi kataṁ aparādhaṁ paṭicca
atk-s0508a24:115_2: ‘‘akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ, ajini maṁ ahāsi me’’tiādinā (dha. pa. 3; mahāva. 464;
atk-s0508a24:115_3: ma. ni. 3.237) kodhassa anupanayhanasīlo. Santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya
atk-s0508a24:115_4: abhāvato amāyo. Pisuṇavācāvirahitato rittapesuṇo, sa ve tādisako bhikkhūti so tathārūpo
atk-s0508a24:115_5: tathājātiko yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato bhikkhu . Evaṁ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyā pecca
atk-s0508a24:115_6: paraloke na socati sokanimittassa abhāvato. Cakkhudvārādayo kāyadvārādayo ca guttā
atk-s0508a24:115_7: pihitā saṁvutā etassāti guttadvāro. Kalyāṇasīloti sundarasīlo suvisuddhasīlo. Kalyāṇamittoti –
atk-s0508a24:117: Gambhīrañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye’’ti. (a. ni. 7.37) –
atk-s0508a24:118: Evaṁ vibhāvitalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto. Kalyāṇapaññoti sundarapañño. Yadipi paññā nāma asundarā natthi, niyyānikāya pana paññāya vasena evaṁ vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a24:119_0: Evamettha kodhādīnaṁ vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca akkodhanādimukhena, puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0508a24:119_1: gāthāya sammāpaṭipattiṁ dassetvā idāni nipphattitalokuttarasaddhādike uddharitvā
atk-s0508a24:119_2: puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva gāthāya sammāpaṭipattiṁ dassento ‘‘yassa saddhā’’tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a24:119_3: Tassattho – yassa puggalassa tathāgate sammāsambuddhe ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinayappavattā
atk-s0508a24:119_4: maggenāgatasaddhā, tato eva acalā avikampā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. ‘‘Atthī’’ti, padaṁ
atk-s0508a24:119_5: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Ariyakantanti ariyānaṁ kantaṁ piyāyitaṁ bhavantarepi avijahanato.
atk-s0508a24:119_6: Pasaṁsitanti buddhādīhi pasaṭṭhaṁ, vaṇṇitaṁ thomitaṁ atthīti yojanā. Taṁ panetaṁ
atk-s0508a24:119_7: sīlaṁ gahaṭṭhasīlaṁ pabbajitasīlanti duvidhaṁ. Tattha gahaṭṭhasīlaṁ nāma pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṁ,
atk-s0508a24:119_8: yaṁ gahaṭṭhena rakkhituṁ sakkā. Pabbajitasīlaṁ nāma dasasikkhāpadasīlaṁ upādāya sabbaṁ
atk-s0508a24:119_9: catupārisuddhisīlaṁ, tayidaṁ sabbampi akhaṇḍādibhāvena aparāmaṭṭhatāya ‘‘kalyāṇa’’nti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:120_0: Saṅghe pasādo yassatthīti ‘‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’’tiādinā ariyasaṅghe
atk-s0508a24:120_1: pasādo saddhā yassa puggalassa atthi acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti ānetvā yojetabbaṁ. Ujubhūtañca
atk-s0508a24:120_2: dassananti diṭṭhivaṅkābhāvato kilesavaṅkābhāvato ca ujubhūtaṁ. Akuṭilaṁ ajimhaṁ kammassakatādassanañceva
atk-s0508a24:120_3: sappaccayanāmarūpadassanañcāti duvidhampi dassanaṁ yassa atthi acalaṁ suppatiṭṭhitanti
atk-s0508a24:120_4: yojanā. Adaliddoti taṁ āhu saddhādhanaṁ, sīladhanaṁ, sutadhanaṁ, cāgadhanaṁ, paññādhananti
atk-s0508a24:120_5: imesaṁ suvisuddhānaṁ dhanānaṁ atthitāya ‘‘adaliddo’’ti taṁ tādisaṁ puggalaṁ buddhādayo
atk-s0508a24:120_6: ariyā āhu. Amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ tassa tathārūpassa jīvitaṁ diṭṭhadhammikādiatthādhigamena
atk-s0508a24:121_1: vuccati, tasmā ahampi tathārūpo bhaveyyanti. Saddhañca…pe… sāsananti ‘‘sabbapāpassa
atk-s0508a24:121_2: akaraṇa’’ntiādinā (dha. pa. 183; dī. ni. 2.90) vuttaṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ anussaranto
atk-s0508a24:121_3: kulaputto vuttappabhedaṁ saddhañceva sīlañca dhammadassanahetukaṁ dhamme sunicchayā
atk-s0508a24:122: Evaṁ thero bhikkhūnaṁ dhammadesanāmukhena attani vijjamāne guṇe pakāsento aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a24:125_0: Yadāpaṭhamamaddakkhintiādikā āyasmato mahāpanthakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ
atk-s0508a24:125_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiyo hutvā
atk-s0508a24:125_2: ekadivasaṁ satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṁ
atk-s0508a24:125_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a24:125_4: sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā, ‘‘bhante, yaṁ bhikkhuṁ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake
atk-s0508a24:125_5: – ‘saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṁ ayaṁ mama sāsane aggo’ti etadagge ṭhapayittha, ahampi imassa
atk-s0508a24:125_6: adhikārakammassa balena so bhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane aggo bhaveyya’’nti
atk-s0508a24:125_7: patthanaṁ akāsi. Kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa tatheva bhagavati adhikārakammaṁ katvā manomayassa
atk-s0508a24:125_8: kāyassābhinimmānaṁ cetovivaṭṭakosallanti dvinnaṁ aṅgānaṁ vasena vuttanayeneva paṇidhānaṁ
atk-s0508a24:125_9: akāsi. Bhagavā dvinnampi patthanaṁ anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā ‘‘anāgate
atk-s0508a24:125_10: kappasatasahassamatthake gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane tumhākaṁ patthanā
atk-s0508a24:126_0: Te ubhopi janā tattha yāvajīvaṁ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattiṁsu. Tattha
atk-s0508a24:126_1: mahāpanthakassa antarākataṁ kalyāṇadhammaṁ na kathīyati. Cūḷapanthako pana kassapassa
atk-s0508a24:126_2: bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni odātakasiṇakammaṁ katvā devapure
atk-s0508a24:126_3: nibbatti. Apadāne pana ‘‘cūḷapanthako padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tāpaso hutvā
atk-s0508a24:126_4: himavante vasanto tattha bhagavantaṁ disvā pupphacchattena pūjaṁ akāsī’’ti āgataṁ.
atk-s0508a24:126_5: Tesaṁ devamanussesu saṁsarantānaṁyeva kappasatasahassaṁ atikkantaṁ. Atha amhākaṁ
atk-s0508a24:126_6: satthā abhisambodhiṁ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṁ upanissāya veḷuvane
atk-s0508a24:127_0: Tena ca samayena rājagahe dhanaseṭṭhissa dhītā attano dāsena saddhiṁ santhavaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a24:127_1: ñātakehi bhītā hatthasāraṁ gahetvā tena saddhiṁ palāyitvā aññattha vasantī taṁ paṭicca
atk-s0508a24:127_2: gabbhaṁ labhitvā paripakkagabbhā ‘‘ñātigharaṁ gantvā vijāyissāmī’’ti gacchantī antarāmaggeyeva
atk-s0508a24:127_3: puttaṁ vijāyitvā sāminā nivattitā pubbe vasitaṭṭhāne vasantī puttassa panthe jātattā
atk-s0508a24:127_4: panthakoti, nāmaṁ akāsi. Tasmiṁ ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle tameva paṭicca
atk-s0508a24:127_5: dutiyaṁ gabbhaṁ paṭilabhitvā paripakkagabbhā pubbe vuttanayeneva antarāmagge puttaṁ
atk-s0508a24:127_6: vijāyitvā sāminā nivattitā jeṭṭhaputtassa mahāpanthakoti kaniṭṭhassa cūḷapanthakoti
atk-s0508a24:127_7: nāmaṁ katvā yathāvasitaṭṭhāneyeva vasantī anukkamena dārakesu vaḍḍhantesu tehi, ‘‘amma,
atk-s0508a24:127_8: ayyakakulaṁ no dassehī’’ti nibundhiyamānā dārake mātāpitūnaṁ santikaṁ pesesi. Tato
atk-s0508a24:127_9: paṭṭhāya dārakā dhanaseṭṭhino gehe vaḍḍhanti. Tesu cūḷapanthako atidaharo. Mahāpanthako
atk-s0508a24:127_10: pana ayyakena saddhiṁ bhagavato santikaṁ gato satthāraṁ disvā saha dassanena paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a24:127_11: dhammaṁ sutvā upanissayasampannatāya pabbajitukāmo hutvā pitāmahaṁ āpucchi. So satthu
atk-s0508a24:127_12: tamatthaṁ ārocetvā taṁ pabbājesi. So pabbajitvā bahuṁ buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso
atk-s0508a24:127_13: upasampajjitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṁ karonto visesato catunnaṁ arūpajjhānānaṁ lābhī
atk-s0508a24:127_14: hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Iti so saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṁ
atk-s0508a24:127_15: aggo jāto. So jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṁ attano paṭipattiṁ
atk-s0508a24:127_16: paccavekkhitvā adhigatasampattiṁ paṭicca sañjātasomanasso sīhanādaṁ nadanto –
atk-s0508a24:130: Tato me ahu saṁvego, passitvā purisuttamaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:145: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:151: Sabbaṁ taṇhaṁ visosetvā, pallaṅkena upāvisi’’nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a24:152_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṁ kāle. Paṭhamanti ādito. Addakkhinti passiṁ, satthāranti, bhagavantaṁ.
atk-s0508a24:152_1: Akutobhayanti nibbhayaṁ. Ayañhettha attho – sabbesaṁ bhayahetūnaṁ bodhimūleyeva pahīnattā
atk-s0508a24:152_2: kutocipi bhayābhāvato akutobhayaṁ nibbhayaṁ, catuvesārajjavisāradaṁ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0508a24:152_3: veneyyānaṁ yathārahamanusāsanato satthāraṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ mayhaṁ pitāmahena saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a24:152_4: gantvā yāya velāya sabbapaṭhamaṁ passiṁ, taṁ purisuttamaṁ sadevake loke aggapuggalaṁ
atk-s0508a24:152_5: passitvā tato dassanahetu tato dassanato pacchā ‘‘ettakaṁ kālaṁ satthāraṁ daṭṭhuṁ
atk-s0508a24:152_6: dhammañca sotuṁ nālattha’’nti mayhaṁ saṁvego ahu sahottappaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppajji. Uppannasaṁvego
atk-s0508a24:152_7: panāhaṁ evaṁ cintesinti dasseti siriṁ hatthehīti gāthāya. Tassattho – yo vibhavatthiko
atk-s0508a24:152_8: puriso ‘‘upaṭṭhāyiko hutvā tava santike vasissāmī’’ti saviggahaṁ siriṁ sayane upagataṁ
atk-s0508a24:152_9: hatthehi ca pādehi ca koṭṭento paṇāmeyya nīhareyya, so tathārūpo alakkhikapuriso
atk-s0508a24:152_10: etādisaṁ satthāraṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ ārādhetvā imasmiṁ navame khaṇe paṭilabhitvā virādhaye
atk-s0508a24:152_11: tassa ovādākaraṇena taṁ virajjheyya, ahaṁ panevaṁ na karomīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ‘‘tadāhaṁ…pe…
atk-s0508a24:152_12: anagāriya’’nti. Tattha chaḍḍayinti, pajahiṁ. ‘‘Chaḍḍiya’’ntipi pāṭho. Nanu ayaṁ thero
atk-s0508a24:152_13: dārapariggahaṁ akatvāva pabbajito, so kasmā ‘‘puttadārañca chaḍḍayi’’nti avocāti?
atk-s0508a24:152_14: Yathā nāma puriso anibbattaphalameva rukkhaṁ chindanto acchinne tato laddhaphalehi
atk-s0508a24:153_0: Sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā adhisīlasikkhā, tāya ca, yattha bhikkhū saha jīvanti,
atk-s0508a24:153_1: ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, tena bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātena sājīvena
atk-s0508a24:153_2: ca samannāgato sikkhanabhāvena samaṅgībhūto, sikkhaṁ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto
atk-s0508a24:153_3: hutvā tadubhayaṁ sampādentoti attho. Tena suvisuddhe pātimokkhe sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a24:153_4: dasseti. Indriyesu susaṁvutoti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu suṭṭhu saṁvuto. Rūpādivisayesu
atk-s0508a24:153_7: dassitameva hotīti thero attano catupārisuddhisīlasampadaṁ dassetvā ‘‘namassamāno
atk-s0508a24:153_8: sambuddha’’nti iminā buddhānussatibhāvanānuyogamāha. Vihāsiṁ aparājitoti kilesamārādīhi
atk-s0508a24:153_9: aparājito eva hutvā vihariṁ, yāva arahattappatti, tāva tehi anabhibhūto, aññadatthu
atk-s0508a24:154_0: Tatoti tasmā, yasmā suvisuddhasīlo satthari abhippasanno kilesābhibhavanapaṭipattiyañca
atk-s0508a24:154_1: ṭhito, tasmā. Paṇidhīti paṇidhānaṁ. Tato vā cittābhinīhāro. Āsīti ahosi. Cetaso abhipatthitoti,
atk-s0508a24:154_2: mama cittena icchito. Kīdiso pana soti āha ‘‘na nisīde muhuttampi, taṇhāsalle anūhate’’ti.
atk-s0508a24:154_3: ‘‘Aggamaggasaṇḍāsena mama hadayato taṇhāsalle anuddhaṭe muhuttampi na nisīde, nisajjaṁ
atk-s0508a24:154_4: na kappeyya’’nti evaṁ me cittābhinīhāro ahosīti attho.
atk-s0508a24:155_0: Evaṁ pana cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāya bhāvanaṁ bhāvayitvā ṭhānacaṅkameheva rattiṁ vītināmento
atk-s0508a24:155_1: arūpasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgamukhena vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a24:155_2: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘tassa me’’tiādi. Nirūpadhīti kilesupadhiādīnaṁ abhāvena nirupadhi.
atk-s0508a24:155_3: Ratyāvivasāneti rattibhāgassa vigamane vibhātāya rattiyā. Sūriyuggamanaṁ patīti sūriyuggamanaṁ
atk-s0508a24:155_4: lakkhaṇaṁ katvā. Sabbaṁ taṇhanti kāmataṇhādibhedaṁ sabbaṁ taṇhāsotaṁ aggamaggena
atk-s0508a24:155_5: visosetvā sukkhāpetvā ‘‘taṇhāsalle anūhate na nisīde’’ti, paṭiññāya mocitattā. Pallaṅkena
atk-s0508a24:155_6: upāvisinti pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā nisīdinti. Sesaṁ uttānatthameva.
